1.content:
"Uuugggghhhhh" You groan as you lie down, your eyes glued shut. You knew you shouldn't have stayed up so late partying. But of course, the alcohol I'm your head convinced you otherwise.

You are Daniel Redock, a 22 year old college student. You may not have the best grades, but what you lack in smarts, you make up for in personality. You are a bit popular on campus, but you are still interested in Japanese culture and media, mostly manga, anime, and video games. This doesn't stop you from having a good time though.

Last night you were invited to a party, and though you can't remember much, you know a lot of beer was involved. Your head pounds at the hangover you have.

You manage to peak open your eyes, but can't make anything out. You push a hand down and feel a bit of dirt beneath you. You place a hand on your head, trying to suppress the throbbing headache. "God what a night."

It was then you looked up as your eyes regained focus......
1.title: A Rude Awakening.

11.content:
You see a sheer drop almost directly in front of you. Your slow reaction starts working, and you slowly back up. As you back up, you see a rocky floor beneath you, and soon your back hits a wall of hard rock. You start looking around as your vision clears, and you realize you are high on top of a mountain. The solid rock behind you props you up as you sit and look around. After a long time of waiting, the hangover subsides, and you manage to stand up.

You look at yourself. You still have the same T-Shirt and Jeans you wore to the party, both a bit ripped. Your shoes seem intact. You take a few steps on the path and soon your body works fine.

You look around and see the path you are on is high on the mountain. You start walking down the path at a slow speed. Questions about how you got here and what happened last night ring through your head. After a few minutes of traveling down you see what looks to be a large opening in the mountain. The cave had a chilling air surrounding it. "Maybe I should rest a bit. Wouldn't hurt to recover in there. On the other hand, though, I need to find out where I am." You ponder for a second. You then decide to......
11.title: A Mountain Area.

111.content:
You decide to rest until your body works normally. You peak inside the cave. The walls were smooth; very few stalactites and stalagmites protruded from the roof or floor. The damp floor was a bit slippery, but you manage to keep balance as you walk inside.

You find a good indention in the wall, one big enough to lay in. You sit down and you dread out your legs, soon falling asleep.

After a few hours you start to wake up, but you notice something is off. You feel a weight on your legs. Not morning weight, but as if something was sitting on them. Your eyes open and when they focus, you see......
111.title: Cave Diving

1111.content:
You see a pair of feet standing on your legs. These feet were unlike any you had seen before, mostly because they were dark blue. You slowly look up and your eyes widen: A blue woman was standing on you.

Your eyes scan the woman in fear. Her skin seemed to be covered in scales, varying in colors from blue, black, and purple. She had markings of black and purple around her body, and six black appendages stuck out of her back. She had slender legs that led up to a seemingly plump ass, and her stomach was neat and slender. Her arms were crossed in front of her massive breasts, to which you seemed to stare at. You shake your head a bit as you look at her face. She had a mixure of black and purple hair. A fang poked out of her growling mouth, an her red eyes gleamed. She had a stern look on her face. Her hands were tucked into her arms.

You shake a bit and try to force up a smile. "He---Hello." You manage to spurt out.

She grit her teeth and let out a growl. "Who are you, and what are you doing in my cave?!?"

You gulp. She had an intimidating voice. "Well......uh.....I just.....thought I'd rest here......I don't exactly.....know where I am...."

"A lost traveler taking refuge?" She glared. "I don't like trespassers.....I'd ought to just-"

She stopped suddenly. She leaned in closer as her eyes scanned your body. You look into her purple eyes in fear. She blinks a bit.

"You.....are you......a male?" She suddenly asked.

Now it was your turn to blink. "Uh...yeah. I'm definitely a guy."

She looks at you more, then she slowly uncrossed her arms. Your eyes get even wider as you see what appears to be two snake-like heads attached to where her hands should be attached. The heads stare at you mindlessly.

You shove even more. What was this? You had never seen a blue, purple and black woman with snake-heads for hands.

Her three heads continued to examine you. "And....you are a human?"

"Y-yes.....I...I am a human."

She stands up again and gets off of your legs. "It has been a long time since a male has been here."

You eye her with questioning look. "Huh? Long time since a guy has been in your cave?"

She shakes her heads. "No. Since a man has been in this world" She then bows. "I apologize for my behavior. I'm am Carmen, the Hydreigon."

You look at her in disbelief. "What? A Hydreigon? That Dragon Pokemon? But...."

She smirks. "Pokemon don't exist? The last human said the same thing. While it is true that Pokemon are more animalistic in your world, in this world, we exist like humans."

He nods, staring to put together the similarities of a Hydreigon and Carmen. "Well.....you said it's been a long time since a male has been here. Aren't there any male Pokemon?"

Again, she shook her heads. "All the males wiped each other out. It was an instinct no one could suppress."

You start feeling a bit guilty for playing a game that had several creatures fighting each other after hearing that. "So.....what is this place?"

Carmen smiled and picked you up with one of her mouths. You shiver a bit, but you feel a bit calmer. She leads you out of the cave. "This is what you call 'The Pokemon World.'

If there was any moment in your life that was straight out of a movie, it was now. The sun shone across the massive forest that expanded in front of you. You couldn't see any wildlife, though. But just the beauty of the scene made you smile.

Carmen turned to you. "Now, what is your name?"

You turn back to her, still a bit nervous. "Daniel. I'm Daniel."

"Ok, Daniel. I would like to provide my services, if I can. I can fly you to the nearest town, if you want. Or if you still feel tired, I'll be happy to share my cave....."
1111.title: Three Heads means Three Times the Trouble.

choices: An Mankey Girl runs over you.
11111.content:
"I'd very much like to see a town." You nod your head. "Maybe it'll help me know exactly where I am."

Carmen smiled. "Ok then. I know just the place!" She has her other two mouths grab your arms and she extends her wing like appendages. "Here we go!"

Carmen started levitating off the ground. You rise and feel a bit nervous, but her two heads grabbed your arms like clamps. You turn around and see her tail swaying in the wind as you two start moving. You then feel something on top of your head. You look up, and two walls cover your eyes a bit. Her breasts were resting on your head, and you blushed a little.

The fly was a bit quiet. You didn't want to distract Carmen while she was focused on keeping airborn. You decide to look down and out. You had just reached the edge of the forest, and you see some small figures running around in the fields. They were too far away to be seen clearly, but you could make out the forms of girls. You look outwards and see a rolling field expanding before you, and , in the distance, was a city-like settlement. "Is that it?" You ask.

"Yes. That's one of the biggest settlements in this region." Carmen looked staight forward as she talked, making it a bit difficult to hear. "That's where I go daily to meet with friends. I was on my way when I found you in my cave."

"Sorry to keep you." You made a shy smile as you get closer to the city.

The two of you started to descend as you near the city. Carmen sets you down and lands right outside the city. "This way." She motions for you to follow her.

As you two are about to enter the city......
11111.title: Go to a Town.

111112.content:
You hear a small noise in the air. It then grew louder very quickly, and before you realise it was coming from behind you.....BAM! You are knocked off your feet. You land facedown and you here Carmen shout. "Daniel!"

You push yourself up, but rather than dirt beneath your hands, you feel something furry. You press down and you feel that the furry object below you is soft. It was then you look and notice that you are in the same position many otaku boys found themselves in in anime: hand resting on the breasts of a young girl.

As soon as you realise this, you retract your hands and back away quickly. The girl picked herself up and rubbed her head. "Ow.....sorry about that."

As you studder to apologize, you look over the girls body. She looked human, a lot more human than Carmen. Her skin was peach colored and covered in fur. Her hands and feet had a shade of brown, and behind her she had a long tail. Her ears were pointed a bit, and her eyebrows were a bit on the thick side. You try to but a Pokemon where she is. "N-No. I'm sorry.....uh....Mankey girl?"

She opens her eyes and looks at you. "Hm? Yeah, I'm a Mankey. My name is Tina." She smiled. "And it was my fault. I ran into you."

"Um...well....ok...."

Tina looked at you more carefully "Hmm......what are you? I've never seen a Pokemon like you before."

This is where Carmen stepped in. "He isn't a Pokemon. He is human."

Tina's eyes shot open. "Human? He's a human?!?" Her shouts seemed to go on forever.

And that shout brought the attention of several Pokegirls nearby. You try to recognize some, but the number soon grew so much that you were a bit scared. You back away a bitas the crowd grew, each Pokegirl staring at you with smiles on their faces. Carmen places a head on your shoulder. "We need to go..."

One girl moved from the front of the group towards you.

And chaos was released. The crowd charged.

"NOW!" Carmen grasped you and Tina and started flying into the city. A few bird Pokegirls gave chase, but Carmen wove through the city. Only one Pokegirl kept up: what looked to be a Staraptor girl.

"I can get us to the house I was going to....but we may need another place instead."

You look around, hoping to find a sanctuary. You see coming up is an alleyway that you think may lose the Staraptor girl......
111112.title: Crash and Thrash

choices: Something in the dumpster grabs her.
1111121.content:
"There! There's an alleyway. We can lose her in there!"

Carmen nodded and she circled around and dashed for the alley. The Staraptor gave chase, but Carmen didn't go through the alleyway completely; she had used the shadows to hide behind a dumpster. The Staraptor flew on, trying to find the runaway trio.

Carmen sighed. "That was close." She then sniffed the air and covered her nose with a mouth. "Forgot we landed near a dumpster."

You nod and look at Tina, who was shaking. "What was that all about?"

"It's been a long time since I've seen a human!" She reaches out and hugs you.

You blush a bit as she hugs you, but then you push her away. "I just hope they don't find us. I don't want to get mobbed."

"Don't worry." Carmen assured. "I'll keep you safe" She then clenches her nose tighter. "My Arceus, what is that stench?"

Tina sniffed and turned green as she covered her nose too. "It stinks!"

You take a sniff and the immediately cover your nose. This powerful smell brought tears to your eyes. It was indescribable how horrible it was.

Tina's eyes grew wide, and then she passed out. Carmen still looked good, but then.......
1111121.title: Sticky Situation.

11111211.content:
Out of what seemed like nowhere, a squishing sound was heard. Next thing you know, Carmen's face is covered in a purple ooze. She flailed a bit trying to wipe it off, but then she fainted, overpowered by the smell.

"What the hell?!?" You look around the alley. You then see a small manhole without a cover in the middle of the alley. Out of the manhole, a purple sludge seemed to be moving towards you. You scramble to back away but the alley was narrow and you couldn't move back.

The sludge started to grow, getting taller and wider underneath. As the sludge grew, parts of it protuded out, soon forming hands. The sludge continued to form, a a bit of a giggle could be heard over the squishing of the ooze. As you see this happening, you are paralyzed both by fear and of the stench the ooze seemed to have.

The sludge seemed to finally stop forming, and you look at it. The bottom half was a giant pool of sludge, formless. Then as it neared the top, it slimed down, forming what looked to be a midsection of a human. Even further up, you saw the top half of a girl made if the same slime beneath her. She had a smirk on her face. Her hair was not hair, but slime formed to look like it. She giggled a bit more as she saw your terrified face.

"Ah...so you are the new human here." She said in a slightly seductive voice.

You studded as you respond. "Y-yeah.....and you?"

"I'm Leslie. I'm a Muk." She smiled and her lower body inches forwards. "You seem pretty scared without those other two."

"Well.....why did you..."

"Oh, don't worry. They will wake up. How long it will take, I don't know." Her slime crawls onto your feet. "But I just want you."

You scream a bit as she grabs you with her arms, pulling you waist deep into her slime.

"Now now," She said, wagging her finger. "Lets enjoy this moment. I know I will......"
11111211.title: Stuck in a Muk.

111112111.content:
You close your eyes, preparing for the worst the sludge bodied girl has for you.......when you hear a groan. You turn your head to see the Carmen's two heads swiping off the sludge, and Carmen blinks awake. The Hydreigon still had a pale look as she realised she was still covered in a bit of sludge, but her purple eyes burned with fury. She stood up and looked at both you and Leslie.

"Leslie, what the hell?!?" Carmen spoke in a restrained tone.

The Muk girl let out a nervos laugh. "Heyther.....Carmen....uh... I was just....passing by....and I heard about the human.....so...."

All three of Carmen's heads glared at Leslie. "You got ten seconds to crawl back into that sewer."

Leslie gulped and let you go. You back away and start wiping the slime from your pants. The Muk slowly sank back into the manhole back into the sewers.

Carmen's rage seemed burned out and she looked back at you. "I'm so sorry you had to put up with her. She tends to do that to other Pokegirls as well."

You shake a bit as you reply. "Um....how do you know her?"

"Well....when we get to the destination, you'll find out." She picks up Tina, still unconscious. "Let's go. And this time we won't have the chatter box to draw attention."

You nod and stand up, still wiping the Muk off of your lower half. "But what if a Pokegirl sees me? They may draw attention."

"I got that covered." Carmen lays down Tina and picks you up, holding you in a bit of a cradled position. "Just don't scream."

"Don't scream?" Your eyes widen as she........
111112111.title: Carmen Defends You

choices: Tina saw half of the vore.
1111121111.content:
Her to heads hold you as her mouth widens. You see her head seem to shift form and grow a bit, starting to resemble the Hydreigon you know and now somewhat fear. You gulp as you resist to scream and draw attention to you, although that is usually what you would want to do in this situation.

Carmen's heads then slowly lift you up towards her giant mouth. You would shake, but her mouths restrain you. You feel her moist breath as you start entering her mouth. As instructed, you fight the urge to struggle.

As if by instinct, Carmen's tongue lashes out and licks your face. You cringe and close your eyes as the tongue coats you with saliva. You hear her start to moan a bit as she tastes you. The tongue seems to wrap around you and tug on you, wanting to taste more. Your shoulders enter her mouth and you start to hit her throat. The walls of her thoat seems to throb a bit, as if almost straining.

Your waist soon enters and you feel her tongue brush up against your crotch. You somewhat look back and blush a bit as she licks your lower body. Your top half is now bending to go down her throat and you feel the damp walss squish around you.

When she is done with your waist, she slurps up the rest of your body. You suddenly fall in Carmen's stomach. The fleshy walls surround you, and you try and gasp for air as you look around. The stomach was dark, but the walls seemed to glint a bit, letting you see your small moist prison. You the jump a bit as you hear a moan and you feel a small hand rub on the outside.

Carmen smiles and rubs her stomach. "Oh Daniel, I haven't eaten like that in a long time. You tasted really good."

You blush a bit. "Um...Carmen? Don't forget the real reason I'm in here."

Carmen shook her head and blushed a bit. "S-sorry! But yes, This should protect you from other girls.At least they won't see you."

"That's true. Just promise me I'll get out of here when we get to.....wherever we are going."

Carmen pats her stomach. "Sure thing. Let's just get Tina and we'll go."

She turns to Tina......
1111121111.title: Oral Vore

11111211111.content:
Tina still lay unconscious from the stench. The little Mankey was breathing slowly, her chest rising and falling as if she were asleep. Carmen looked down at the girl and shook her head. "We better get you to the house." She picked up Tina with her heads in a cradled position and walked towards the end of the alleyway.

As she peeked out of the alleyway, she didn't see the massive crowd that had chased them earlier. The city seemed pretty normal as of now, with no frantic search party looking for the only male within miles. Carmen nodded and stepped out of the alleyway, walking alongside the sidewalk.

In her stomach, the flesh around you bounces a bit as she walks. The cramped space had gotten smaller as the extra weight of Tina squeezed you inside. You wonder where it is you are going, since Carmen never really told you about where she was headed. All you know is that she was on her way to visit some friends, and then you appeared. As the flesh moves around you, you feel a bit calm. This prison was comfortable, for a dragon girls's stomach. Then again, you wouldn't have known what it was like inside a stomach before this. Girls you meet on the street at home didn't eat humans, much less swallow them whole.

You start getting comfortable when the flesh stops moving, and you feel Carmen stop. You hear voice's outside:

"Hey Carmen. What happened to Tina? Get knocked out by a Pidgeot again?"

"Well, not exactly. She was in the alleyway and a Muk knocked her out. But she's fine. Just got to get her back."

"Ok then." A pause followed, then you feel something poking the stomach. "Wow, you must have been hungry. What did you do? Eat a whole Miltank?"

"Oh....um....well I was feeling a bit hungry......so I...." You feel a sweat drop as she starts trying to make up an answer. "I ate a Tauros on my way here." She blurted out that last part. You continue to sweat as the voices pause again, then you hear a giggle.

"Ok then. Better not keep you. See you later."

"Bye." You let out a sigh and you hear Carmen do the same. "That was close. Let's go."

The flesh starts moving around again as Carmen continues to walk......
11111211111.title: To the Unknown Destination

111112111111.content:
The rest of the walk continued without anyone else bumping into Carmen. Inside her you start to doze off as the warm flesh hugs your body. You smile, thinking it was a lot more comfortable than the rocks of the mountain.

A few minutes pass and you feel Carmen stop again for a second, then you hear a door opening, then you feel her walk again. You wonder if you have made it to the destination when you start hearing more voices outside.

"Jesse? Have you seen Ms. Bliss?"

"In the room in the back, Carmen. What's up"

"It's just Tina again."

"Not surprised. And hey, have you heard about that human male? Do you think it's true?"

"One sec. Let me get Tina taken care of."

Carmen's stomach moved a bit as you start feeling Carmen walking through the building. You hear more doors open and close, then you hear a soft and sweet voice as Carmen stops.

"Carmen. So nice to see you today. What's the trouble."

"Tina ha a run in with a Muk stench. You got a bottle of Aromatheropy?"

"Of course. Just sit tight."

You hear the clanging of glass for a few seconds, then you move a bit more, and a long pause follows. Soon, you hear a soft and familier moan, followed by the sound of Tina's voice.

"What....what happened?"

"You were hit with a Muk stench." You hear Carmen respond. "Just take it easy."

"Oh....ok.....but what about that human?"

"Human?" The character you believe to be Ms. Bliss chimed in. "What about a human? I've heard rumors, but...."

Carmen sighed. "One second. Give me some space."

As soon as she says that, you feel the walls of the stomach tighten and squeeze upward. You somewhat scream as you start going up into her throat and pretty soon you are spewed out of Carmen, laying face-up on the floor covered in Carmen's stomach fluids. As your eyes slowly blink open, you see Carmen and Tina, along with a new face. She had a light pink skin and frills around her body. She was well endowed with her breasts, but it was her extremely slender body that caught your attention. She also had a small pouch on her stomach, with a small white egg inside. You connect the dots in your head and realize that this Ms. Bliss is a Blissey.

Ms. Bliss spoke in a shaken tone. "Oh my. So this is the human. And you ate him, Carmen?"

Carmen nervously smiled. "He was gonna get mobbed by the citizens if I didn't."

"Alright then.....lets get him cleaned up"

Carmen smiled. "Ok. I'll take him to the bath"

Her head pick you up in a cradled position. You smile lazily. "Thanks."

Ms. Bliss smiles back. "Think nothing of it, Mr....."

"Daniel Redock."

"Well, pleasure to meet you, Daniel. Carmen, get him clean, and Tina, pick out something for him to wear while his clothes are clean."

"Yes, ma'am" Both replied, then they headed out the door.
111112111111.title: Throw Up at the House

choices: A group of Pokegirls are getting changed.
1111121111111.content:
You look around the halls as Carmen carries you. The walls were a shade of tan, and the doors along the hallways seemed to be personalized by different people. On one door you saw black feathers and stars, on another various seashells, and then one particular door that caught your eyes was the three heads of a Hydreigon glaring at the outside.

You gulp a bit, and as Carmen passed the room, she smiled. "That's my room for when I stay here. It's not quite home, but with everyone else here, it's just as good."

You nod a bit. You feel the stomach juices slowly moving around your body with every step. You are a bit relieved to be out of the stomach, but a part of you misses the comfort it held. But you shake the thought off, thinking how a bed would be much better.

As you reach the end of the hall, though, a figure stands in the doorway. You look at the figure and your eyes widen at the sight if a lovely woman.

This woman was a bit taller than Carmen, and had a lighter shade of blue skin covering her. She had red eyes, but not as red as Carmen's, and silver hair. You look down and your jaw drops. She wore a small, silver chest plate that graciously cut off at her stomach, showing tons of midriff. But the armor was formed and cut off a bit at the top, showing the cleavage of her massive breasts. There was an ornate X that curved along the armor, emphasizing her bosom, which you believed to be bigger than Carmen's. You look down past her midriff and see a scanty pair of armor that looked like a pair of shorts. Her legs were long and slender. You examine her body, but soon your eyes wander back up to her breasts.

Carmen sees this and shakes you a bit in her arms.

The woman smiled. "Hello, Carmen. Nice to see you finally showed up." She leaned over a bit and looked at you. "And who is this little guy?"

Carmen grunted a bit. "None of your business, Gilda. Now if you excuse me, I gotta get Daniel to the baths." She tried to push through, but Gilda stepped in front if her. Your face is meet inches away from her stomach. You then look up and see the armor-clad breasts above you. You blush a bit.

"Aww....don't be like that, Carmen. I know you Hydreigon are feisty, but you don't have to be rude."

Carmen scowled. "And you Metagross are supposed to be smart enough to take a hint, but I guess that didn't come with you, now did it?"

Gilda frowned. "Fine then. Go and wash him up." She steps back and leans closer to you. "I look forward to spending some time with him." She licks her lips, then walks away.

Carmen continues to walk, a scowl on her face. You blush a bit. "Friend of yours?"

"Hardly. I don't want to talk about it."

"Ok then." You two continue walking, soon reaching a door.

"Here we are." Carmen opens the door.....
1111121111111.title: Enter Gilda, the Metagross

11111211111111.content:
Carmen opened the door to find the bathroom empty. She sighed and entered, and you look around the room. It wasn't an average American bathroom. Much like in Japanese culture, there was a large bath that was seperate from a showing station. And this bath was large, you think it may have been able to hold the entire residency of the house.

Carmen set you down in a seat and started running the bath, steam filling up the room as warm water flowed. You sigh a bit. This was the first modern day comfort you have had since you woke up in this world. You think of all the things you would be doing back in your world, but then sigh, still wondering how you got in this world in the first place. You blame the alcohol for imparing from the night before.

Carmen turns to you. "You may want to get out of those clothes."

You look down at yourself. Your clothes were soaked, and you wonder if they migh. Even be a bit dissolved. But you nod and take of your clothes, all but your underwear. Carmen tilts her head a bit. "Why don't you take those off?"

You look at her and your eyes widen. Her scales seemed to gleam from the steam's water, and you look at her naked body. All of this was enough to give you a boner. You blush a bit and try to cover it. "Well....You are still here...."

"And? I still see nothing wrong."

You gulp. "It's just....where I come from, being naked in front of a woman is indecent."

"I assure you, it isn't indecent here. I don't mind." Carmen smiles reassuringly.

You blush more and your hands move down, slipping off your underwear. As you do, you desperately try and cover your member from Carmen's view.

Carmen smiles as you both are completely naked. She turns off the water and smile. "Here you go, Daniel."

You nod and walk to the bath, sighing in relief as you take a step into the warm water. It only takes you a few seconds to immerse yourself in the bath water. You close your eyes as you start to relax.

Then you feel something soft press against your back.

Your eyes shoot open as you turn your head. Carmen was behind you, rubbing a bar of soap on your back, her F-cup breasts pressing lightly against you. You blush. "Wha....what are you doing?"

"I'm washing your back for you. I don't want you to have and bacteria from my stomach." Carmen smiled as she continues to was you.

"Well....thank you." You look down at the water, blushing as the Hydreigon girl cleans your back. Then you turn around a bit. "Carmen, can I ask you a question?"

Carmen nodded. "Of course. What is on your mind?"
11111211111111.title: A Bath and A Dragon

111112111111111.content:
"What exactly is this house for? Don't you all have homes for yourselves?"

Carmen sighs a bit. "You ready to listen to the story?" You nod.

She started scrubbing your back again. "As I said before, it has been years since the male Pokemon wiped each other out. Only females live in this world, and every so often, a human, like yourself, is brought here."

"Yeah. I remember."

"But we are starting to understand why. Without the male Pokemon, we aren't able to breed new generations of our species. Most of the latest generation have become adults. Tina is part of the latest, and she is already 20."

"Wow.....that must be rough."

Carmen slowed down the scrubbing. "Yes, but the worst of it was the anarchy that grows. Various Pokemon started rioting, and many give into animalistic instinct, eating what they catch. Other Pokemon lived in fear, not knowing if they might be another's lunch." She stopped the scurbbing. You turn around and see her looking down. "One of those Pokemon was me."

You fully turn around and look at her. Her eyes were filled with sorrow, it seemed. You sit quietly as she continues.

"I was a Deino, and the last of the breed. Knowing this, I used to live in fear of being killed by a stronger Pokemon. One day, in my cave, a Conkeldurr girl attacked me. She was too strong for me, as I was only a child. It was the end for me." A tear streamed down her blue face. "But then, out of no where, two girls stood in front of me, and faced the Conkeldurr. One was Ms. Bliss, the other her assistant, Ms. Wobb. Ms. Wobb fended off the Conkeldurr, and Ms. Bliss took me away, and sheltered me in this very house."

Tears were flowing from her eyes as she looked down. You try and place a hand on her shoulder, but a head snapped at you, and you quickly recall the hand. Carmen looks up at you, her eyes even more red. "She took care of me and all the other girls in this house who didn't have enough power to survive on their own. This house has been my home away from home ever since. Us girls call it the House of Bliss."

You look into her eyes and nodded. "I see. So Ms. Bliss kept you safe from the attackers here."

Carmen nodded back. "And ever since then I've tried my hardest to strengthen myself. I grew to a Zweilous and finally a Hydreigon. And now I don't fear anymore." She smiled, her lips quivering.

You smile back. "That sounds great, Carmen."

She looks down. "But as I've said, only every so often a human is brought here. And a lot of times they are eaten by the animalistic girls. I have never been able to speak with one." You look out into the water and a pair of glaring eyes have spotted you. You shake your head, thinking you were seeing things, but soon the eyes rose out of the water, revealing a giant fanged mouth. If your pants weren't moist from the waves splashing on them, they were now as you see the serpentine body rise from the water, the eyes of the beast locked onto you.

You stare back in absolute fear, your mind racing. You continually tell yourself that Gyrados's weren't real, but your eyes made out ever detail of the beast believable.

The Gyrados roared at you, the force making you flinch. Your feet slowly start moving like your brain tells them to, and you book it towards the land. The Gyrados lets out another roar as it fires a powerful stream of water at you. The blast lands beside you and the force knocks you off your feet.

You fall on the sand.Your body refuses to move, both paralyzed with fear and wrecked from the water blast. You manage to turn and see the beast slithering closer, it's body coming onto the sand. You cringe and close your eyes, preparing for the worst.....
145.title: A Pokemon Trainers First Nightmare

info.brief_description: A land filled with Pokegirls, and you are the only male.
info.description:
I do NOT own anything if the Pokemon franchise, Nintendo, or anything in this story other than the personality of the characters.

Adding to this story is encouraged. Please help the story grow. The main story is the longest, but please only add to chapters of the main story that have 1 choice lready filled.


Daniel Redock has found himself in the wilderness, only to later discover he has be put into a world filled with Humanoid Pokemon Girls. While exploring this world he catches the eyes of a few Pokegirls, being the first male they have seen in years. He is dragged to a house filled with gorgeous woman, and the story goes from there. How did Daniel get here? And why? You help create his adventure, whether he gets severely laid, or actually manages to get back home.


Basic rules and reg:
1: NO DYING! Not deaths will happen in this story.
2: You can use any of the 649 current Pokemon that can be portrayed as a girl. Ex: Kyogre and Groudon can be Girls, but Gallade cannot because he is a male only Pokemon.
3: Sex is allowed, even encouraged. Rape scenes will be reviewed for appropriateness.
4: Soft vore is allowed. But again, no dying. Oral, breast, and unbirth only.
5: Daniel must not leave until that storyline reaches at least 150 chapters.
6: Be creative and descriptive. What's the point of writing a scene if there is no visuals?
7: Bad grammar and spelling will not be tolerated. Be respectful of the story.

Rules shall be added depending on what I've forgot to put in.

Have fun.
